backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a hospital management system with patient, emergency, doctor, and case assignment management, plus user profiles and role-based access control using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting UI color scheme changes to greenish-blue teal, card border updates with flashy teal styling, spacing/layout refinements for professional appearance, and verification of existing functionality after UI changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components describing role-based navigation, authentication, hospital management interfaces (admin, doctor, patient portals), emergency SOS, symptom checker, medical report analysis, and UI styling with teal borders and improved spacing.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining design tokens for light and dark themes, using grayscale values (0 chroma/saturation) for all color variables including primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx, titled 'Republish app with all features fully functional'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with QueryClient, ThemeProvider, role-based routing (patient/doctor/admin portals), profile setup modal for new users, and authentication state management using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied screen component displaying a shield alert icon with destructive border styling (border-2 border-destructive/20) for unauthorized portal access attempts.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard with tabbed interface switching between emergency case management and doctor management, featuring Shield icon and improved spacing (space-y-8).
frontend/src/components/AdminPortal.tsx: Admin portal component with authentication checks, admin registration form for non-admin users, and AdminDashboard display for verified admins, featuring teal and destructive border styling on cards.
frontend/src/components/CaseManagement.t: Displays and manages emergency cases with filtering by status and department, allowing assignment of doctors to cases. Includes a table view of all emergencies with patient details, status badges, and doctor assignment dropdowns.
frontend/src/components/DoctorManagement: Manages doctors with add/view functionality, organizing doctors by department in an accordion layout. Includes a form to add new doctors with name and department selection.
frontend/src/components/DoctorPortal.tsx: Doctor-specific portal that shows registration form for new doctors and provides access to medical report analysis and assigned emergency cases. Handles authentication checks and doctor profile validation.
frontend/src/components/EmergencySOS.tsx: Form for submitting emergency cases with patient information (name, address), emergency description, and department selection. Shows success alert after submission.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Application footer displaying copyright information and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link with heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header with app branding, authentication controls (login/logout), theme toggle (light/dark/system), role badges (patient/doctor/admin), and home navigation button. Displays user profile name when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/MedicalReportAna: React component for analyzing medical reports using AI, displaying severity classification, key findings, and recommended actions with color-coded badges.
frontend/src/components/PatientPortal.ts: Patient portal component with tabbed interface for Emergency SOS and Symptom Checker features.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for new users to set up their profile by entering their name, with form validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelector.tsx: Landing page component with Vitals AI branding and role selection cards for patient, doctor, and admin portals, featuring smooth scrolling and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/SymptomChecker.t: AI-powered symptom analysis component that accepts symptom descriptions and displays possible conditions with probability, severity, and recommendations.
Empty component file with no content.
Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, handling anonymous and authenticated states with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Authentication hook that checks if the current caller is an admin using the actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for managing user profiles, admin/doctor registration, patient data, emergencies, doctors, departments, and case assignments with mutations and queries that interact with the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and session storage, supporting both regular query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, spacing, typography, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a hospital management system with role-based access (Patient/Doctor/Admin), AI-powered medical features (Vitals AI), emergency SOS, department-based doctor allocation, and known issues requiring fixes.
